intro.title: Finance × Blockchain × AI Explorer
intro.description: I am a Finance undergraduate in the International Experimental Class (Minor in Business Administration and Honors Program in Mathematics) at SWUFE. I have a strong background in quantitative strategies and blockchain technologies. I am experienced in developing machine learning–based and high-frequency trading strategies.  I've also achieved over 300% returns through discretionary trading and provided consultancy to WorldQuant Brain.                                                                                             I am skilled in mathematical modeling, full-stack development, and in-depth evaluation of 10+ cryptocurrency projects. I am focused on exploring the intersection of finance, computer science, and artificial intelligence.

meet.title: I'm excited to meet people who

items.mbti: Are ENTJ / ENFP / INTJ / ISTJ types
